entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:22 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
